content:
---

# Page 12


Customer Complaint Resolution Process

If the outcome of your complaint is not handled to your satisfaction, you can write to:

# Chief Executive Officer

HL Assurance Pte. Ltd.

11 Keppel Road #11-01 ABI Plaza

Singapore 089057

We will respond to your appeal within fourteen (14) working days. If you are still dissatisfied with the CEO’s response, we will refer you to a dispute resolution organization, Financial Industry Disputes Resolution Centre Ltd (FIDReC), which is an independent organization. FIDReC’s contact details are:

# Financial Industry Disputes Resolution Centre Ltd

36 Robinson Road #15-01

City House

Singapore 068877

Telephone: (65) 6327 8878

Fax: (65) 6327 8488

Email: info@fidrec.com.sg

Website: www.fidrec.com.sg

Important – Please remember to quote your Policy number/reference in your communication.

DY022401 Page 12 of 12


---
questions: What should I do if my complaint is not resolved to my satisfaction?
Who can I contact if I want to escalate my complaint?
What is the response time for appeals to the CEO?
What organization will handle my complaint if I am still dissatisfied after the CEO's response?
What are the contact details for the Financial Industry Disputes Resolution Centre Ltd?
Is there a specific piece of information I need to include when communicating with FIDReC?
Where is HL Assurance Pte. Ltd. located?
How can I reach FIDReC by phone?
What is the email address for FIDReC?
What is the website for the Financial Industry Disputes Resolution Centre Ltd?
